1.text: Complete the sentences in the passive voice.
1.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Complete <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> sentences <break time='200ms'/> in <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> passive <break time='200ms'/> voice. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

2.text: The school main hall looked very nice. It …… ……………… (paint) recently.
2.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>The <break time='200ms'/> school <break time='200ms'/> main <break time='200ms'/> hall <break time='200ms'/> looked <break time='200ms'/> very <break time='200ms'/> nice. <break time='200ms'/> It <break time='200ms'/> …… <break time='200ms'/> ……………… <break time='200ms'/> (paint) <break time='200ms'/> recently. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

3.text: We had a lot of homework last week. We …… ……. (give) two reading assignments.
3.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>We <break time='200ms'/> had <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> lot <break time='200ms'/> of <break time='200ms'/> homework <break time='200ms'/> last <break time='200ms'/> week. <break time='200ms'/> We <break time='200ms'/> …… <break time='200ms'/> ……. <break time='200ms'/> (give) <break time='200ms'/> two <break time='200ms'/> reading <break time='200ms'/> assignments. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

4.text: Heshan ……………… (award) the trophy for the best batsman for his outstanding performance in the finals. He was 88 not out.
4.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='heʃan'>Heshan</phoneme> <break time='200ms'/> ……………… <break time='200ms'/> (award) <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> trophy <break time='200ms'/> for <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> best <break time='200ms'/> batsman <break time='200ms'/> for <break time='200ms'/> his <break time='200ms'/> outstanding <break time='200ms'/> performance <break time='200ms'/> in <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> finals. <break time='200ms'/> He <break time='200ms'/> was <break time='200ms'/> 88 <break time='200ms'/> not <break time='200ms'/> out. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

5.text: The Children's Day …… ………… (celebrate) at our school yesterday. All the students …… …….(take) out to see a film.
5.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>The <break time='200ms'/> Children's <break time='200ms'/> Day <break time='200ms'/> …… <break time='200ms'/> ………… <break time='200ms'/> (celebrate) <break time='200ms'/> at <break time='200ms'/> our <break time='200ms'/> school <break time='200ms'/> yesterday. <break time='200ms'/> All <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> students <break time='200ms'/> …… <break time='200ms'/> …….(take) <break time='200ms'/> out <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> see <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> film. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

7.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Reading <break time='200ms'/> and <break time='200ms'/> Writing <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

8.text: These historical events are written in the active voice. Rewrite them in passive voice using the table given in activity 2 in the Workbook.
8.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>These <break time='200ms'/> historical <break time='200ms'/> events <break time='200ms'/> are <break time='200ms'/> written <break time='200ms'/> in <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> active <break time='200ms'/> voice. <break time='200ms'/> Rewrite <break time='200ms'/> them <break time='200ms'/> in <break time='200ms'/> passive <break time='200ms'/> voice <break time='200ms'/> using <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> table <break time='200ms'/> given <break time='200ms'/> in <break time='200ms'/> activity <break time='200ms'/> 2 <break time='200ms'/> in <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> Workbook. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

9.text: 1. Christopher Columbus discovered America 2. Guglielmo Marconi invented the radio 3. Valmiki wrote the Ramayanaya 4. The ancient Egyptians built the pyramids
9.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>1. <break time='200ms'/> Christopher <break time='200ms'/> Columbus <break time='200ms'/> discovered <break time='200ms'/> America <break time='200ms'/> 2. <break time='200ms'/> Guglielmo <break time='200ms'/> Marconi <break time='200ms'/> invented <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> radio <break time='200ms'/> 3. <break time='200ms'/> <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='valmiki'>Valmiki</phoneme> <break time='200ms'/> wrote <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> Ramayanaya <break time='200ms'/> 4. <break time='200ms'/> The <break time='200ms'/> ancient <break time='200ms'/> Egyptians <break time='200ms'/> built <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> pyramids <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>
